name: Resistence don't resist
description: I pointed out in this piece a perspective of how social movements are absorbed by the dominant narrative and diluted in consumer products. Affecting through emotional contagion, managed by a few and spread by many, intentionally or unintentionally. Leading to a complex environment where it is impossible to understand the whole. Causing a passivity in our activism while individualising the desire to be part of a New (5G)eration of activists
